mapper.update: update HRM_ATTENDANCE set ATD_END_TIME = sysdate where ATD_ID = #{atd_id}
mapper.delete: delete from HRM_ATTENDANCE where to_number(ATD_START_TIME-sysdate)=0 and E_ID = #{e_id};
mapper.select: select round(to_number(ATD_END_TIME-ATD_START_TIME)*24)+1 from HRM_ATTENDANCE where E_ID = #{e_id} and months_between(sysdate,ATD_START_TIME)=1
select * from HRM_ATTENDANCE where to_number(ATD_START_TIME-sysdate)=0 and E_ID = #{e_id};
